pygwb.statistical_checks.StatisticalChecks

class pygwb.statistical_checks.StatisticalChecks(segment_duration, njobs, deltaT, deltaF, dsc, ifo_pair, mat_dir, pproc_dir, plot_dir, read_bad_times, segs=None)[source]

Bases: object

__init__(segment_duration, njobs, deltaT, deltaF, dsc, ifo_pair, mat_dir, pproc_dir, plot_dir, read_bad_times, segs=None)[source]

Class for the statistical analysis of the results, which generates and saves plots.

Parameters
segment_duration: int

Duration of a segment in seconds

njobs: int

Number of jobs

deltaT: float

Time delta T used in the analysis

deltaF: float

Frequency delta f used in the analysis

dsc: float

Value used for the delta-sigma cut

ifo_pair: str

Name of the baseline. E.g.: “H1L1”

mat_dir: str

Directory where the mat files are stored

pproc_dir: str

Directory where the output of post-processing is stored

plot_dir: str

Directory where the statistical checks plots will be saved

read_bad_times: boolean

Boolean indicating whether the bad GPS times (after delta-sigma cut) should be read in from file (i.e. True) or computed on the fly here (i.e. False)

segs: float

Parameter used to perform the delta-sigma cut on the fly

Returns
=======
__call__(*args, **kwargs)

Call self as a function.

Methods

__init__(segment_duration, njobs, deltaT, ...)

Class for the statistical analysis of the results, which generates and saves plots.

generate_all_plots()

Generates and saves all the statistical analysis plots.

get_data_after_dsc_cut(read_bad_times[, segs])

Gets the data (such as times, omegas, sigmas) after the delta sigma cut. Parameters ========== read_bad_times: boolean Boolean indicating whether the bad GPS times (after delta-sigma cut) should be read in from file (i.e. True) or computed on the fly here (i.e. False) segs: float Parameter used to perform the delta-sigma cut on the fly.

get_data_before_dsc_cut()

Gets the data (such as times, omegas, sigmas) before the delta sigma cut.

get_ifft_integrand()

Gets the inverse Fourier transform of the FFT point estimate integrand from file.

get_pt_estimate_integrand()

Gets the point estimate integrand from file.

get_running_pt_estimate()

Get the running point estimate from file.

get_sensitivity_integrand()

Gets the sensitivity integrand from file.

plot_IFFT_point_estimate_integrand()

Generates and saves a plot of the IFFT of the point estimate integrand.

plot_KS_test()

Generates and saves a panel plot with results of the Kolmogorov-Smirnov test for Gaussianity.

plot_cumulative_point_estimate()

Generates and saves a plot of the cumulative point estimate.

plot_cumulative_sensitivity_integrand()

Generates and saves a plot of the cumulative sensitivity integrand.

plot_hist_omega_pre_post_dsc()

Generates and saves a histogram of the (Ω-<Ω>)/σ distribution.

plot_hist_scatter_omega_sigma()

Generates and saves a panel plot with a scatter plot of σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ, as well as histograms of the σ and (Ω-<Ω>)/σ distributions.

plot_hist_sigma_dsc()

Generates and saves a panel plot with a histogram of Abs[δσ]/σ, as well as a histogram of σ.

plot_hist_sigma_squared()

Generates and saves a histogram of σ^2/<σ^2>.

plot_imaginary_point_estimate_integrand()

Generates and saves a plot of the imaginary part of the point estimate integrand.

plot_omega_sigma_in_time()

Generates and saves a panel plot with a scatter plot of σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ, as well as the evolution of Ω, σ, and (Ω-<Ω>)/σ as a function of the days since the start of the run.

plot_omega_time_fit()

Generates and saves a plot of Ω as a function of time and fits the data to perform a linear trend analysis.

plot_point_estimate_integrand()

Generates and saves a plot of the point estimate integrand.

plot_real_point_estimate_integrand()

Generates and saves a plot of the real part of the point estimate integrand.

plot_running_point_estimate()

Generates and saves a plot of the running point estimate.

plot_running_sigma()

Generates and saves a plot of the running sigma.

plot_scatter_omega_sigma_dsc()

Generates and saves a panel plot with scatter plots of Abs[δσ]/σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ, as well as σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ.

plot_scatter_sigma_dsc()

Generates and saves a scatter plot of Abs[δσ]/σ vs σ.

plot_sensitivity_integrand()

Generates and saves a plot of the sensitivity integrand.
generate_all_plots()[source]

Generates and saves all the statistical analysis plots.

get_data_after_dsc_cut(read_bad_times, segs=None)[source]

Gets the data (such as times, omegas, sigmas) after the delta sigma cut. Parameters ========== read_bad_times: boolean

Boolean indicating whether the bad GPS times (after delta-sigma cut) should be read in from file (i.e. True) or computed on the fly here (i.e. False)

segs: float

Parameter used to perform the delta-sigma cut on the fly

plot_IFFT_point_estimate_integrand()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the IFFT of the point estimate integrand.

Parameters
Returns
plot_KS_test()[source]

Generates and saves a panel plot with results of the Kolmogorov-Smirnov test for Gaussianity. The cumulative distribution of the data is compared to the one of Gaussian data.

Parameters
Returns
plot_cumulative_point_estimate()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the cumulative point estimate.

Parameters
Returns
plot_cumulative_sensitivity_integrand()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the cumulative sensitivity integrand.

Parameters
Returns
plot_hist_omega_pre_post_dsc()[source]

Generates and saves a histogram of the (Ω-<Ω>)/σ distribution. The plot shows the data before and after the delta-sigma cut was applied.

Parameters
Returns
plot_hist_scatter_omega_sigma()[source]

Generates and saves a panel plot with a scatter plot of σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ, as well as histograms of the σ and (Ω-<Ω>)/σ distributions. All plots show the data after the delta-sigma cut.

Parameters
Returns
plot_hist_sigma_dsc()[source]

Generates and saves a panel plot with a histogram of Abs[δσ]/σ, as well as a histogram of σ. Both plots show the data before and after the delta-sigma cut was applied.

Parameters
Returns
plot_hist_sigma_squared()[source]

Generates and saves a histogram of σ^2/<σ^2>. The plot shows data after the delta-sigma cut.

Parameters
Returns
plot_imaginary_point_estimate_integrand()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the imaginary part of the point estimate integrand.

Parameters
Returns
plot_omega_sigma_in_time()[source]

Generates and saves a panel plot with a scatter plot of σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ, as well as the evolution of Ω, σ, and (Ω-<Ω>)/σ as a function of the days since the start of the run. All plots show the data before and after the delta-sigma cut was applied.

Parameters
Returns
plot_omega_time_fit()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of Ω as a function of time and fits the data to perform a linear trend analysis. The plot shows data after the delta-sigma cut.

Parameters
Returns
plot_point_estimate_integrand()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the point estimate integrand.

Parameters
Returns
plot_real_point_estimate_integrand()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the real part of the point estimate integrand.

Parameters
Returns
plot_running_point_estimate()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the running point estimate.

Parameters
Returns
plot_running_sigma()[source]

Generates and saves a plot of the running sigma.

Returns
plot_scatter_omega_sigma_dsc()[source]

Generates and saves a panel plot with scatter plots of Abs[δσ]/σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ, as well as σ vs (Ω-<Ω>)/σ. All plots show the data before and after the delta-sigma cut was applied.

Parameters
Returns
plot_scatter_sigma_dsc()[source]

Generates and saves a scatter plot of Abs[δσ]/σ vs σ. The plot shows the data before and after the delta-sigma cut was applied.
